channel.title: Music – 배너(VANNER)

item.title: 배너(VANNER) - Diamonds
item.description:
Lalalalala hey, Lalalalala woah, Lalalalala
Here we go, Here we go

기다려왔던 시간이 시작될 테니

item.title: 배너(VANNER) - 솔직히 (TBH)
item.description:
